item.description:
Hi Trailblazers join us for an evening of dancing after dinner (Jumping Jay's Fish restaurant)as we check out the Jumbo Circus Peanuts band as it's the happiest night of the year. For you sticklers, it's actually Samedi Gras, our version of Fat Tuesday (Mardi Gras) moved to Saturday night to assure the maximum potential revelry. Get your mojo workin', wear a funky costume and join us for the Seacoast's only authentic carnival celebration. Genuine New Orleans music. Dancin' and carryin' on. A must-go Peanut event! Proceeds benefit WSCA, community radio in Portsmouth. Doors at 8, music at 9. Clean rest rooms, Free parking. Value-priced cocktails.

$10 admission

 

See you there

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Mardi Gras Ball
